title: Shield Proficiency
content:
Shield Proficiency Wielding a shield will not impose Disadvantage on your Attack Rolls or prevent the casting of spells.

Shield Proficiency

Wielding a shield will not impose Disadvantage on your Attack Rolls or prevent the casting of spells.

Shield Proficiency is a Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Features provide unique abilities or effects and can be acquired depending on the Character's Race, Class and level.

Shield Proficiency Information

Wielding a shield will not impose Disadvantage on you
